title: ***1 BEDROOM/1 BATH! AVAILABLE!!!!!
map_address: 5100 E Tropicana Ave near Nellis Blvd
posting_body: Sonoma Hills features spacious floor plans with ample closet space and each apartment has a private patio and fully appointed kitchens.
The community is conveniently located near shopping, library, and bus line.
Our location puts you within close reach of anything you'd need and our community is spaciously laid out with fully landscaped walkways and courtyards lush with mature trees.
Room to spread out and enjoy life.
Come see all that awaits you at Sonoma Hills!
Call today to view your new future home
